question: The mean of 9 observations is 16. One more observation is included and the new mean becomes 17. The 10th observation is :
explanation:
Mean of ten observations - Mean if nine observations = Tenth observation
= 10 $latex \\times$ 17 - 16 $latex \\times$ 9
= 170 - 144 = 26
Hence option [C] is correct answer.
